"Leso": "Agh, it's a cold one today..."
"Oh? You... You seem like you know how to handle yourself, now that I look at you."
"I'm interested to see just how strong you are. I hope I can get you to show me how skilled you are one day."
"Hello... I'm the vanguard's quartermaster. You can call me Leso."
"Hehehe... You look very strong."
"You know... we have a policy here that says the strongest ARKS get priority for receiving new materials."
"I'd like to test your abilities... to see if you fit that bill."
"I'll be counting on you to take out those Crocodallus in Northern Kvaris..."
"Please take out those Crocodallus..."
"They can usually be found in Bergana Ruins..."
"I will be watching very intently... to see how you defeat these enemies."
"I see... Whenever you can, then..."
"I see you were able to return. Good work out there..."
"I had a look at the combat data you sent back."
"Astounding. I could hardly take my eyes off of the fight..."
"You've passed the first test, and with flying colors."
"Let's move on to the next test..."
"Alright... let's continue with your provision qualification test..."
"The procedure will be the same as before... Let me know when you're ready and we'll begin."
"Your next target will be Equalizing Enemies."
"In Kvaris, they can be found in places like Bergana Ruins and Lost Central..."
"Of course, if you want to look for them in other regions, that'll work too."
"I see... That's really too bad..."
"I see you were able to return. Good work out there..."
"I've finished reviewing your combat data as well."
"I could watch your fights over and oveer again for hours and not get bored... You're really something else..."
"You've passed the test, of course. You are cleared to receive priority goods and services..."
"However, that doesn't mean you can have anything you want for free..."
"You will have to provide certain items in exchange for what you want..."
"If there's anything that interests you, please do let me know..."
"And well, I would be happy if you let me watch you fight every now and then..."
"See you around..."
